source:
%%sql

-- SELECT 
--     T2.EmployeeNumber,
--     T2.FirstName,
--     T2.LastName,
--     T2.Gender,
--     T2.DOB,
--     T2.AddressLine1,
--     T2.AddressLine2,
--     T2.City,
--     T2.County,
--     T2.Postcode,
--     T2.EmailAddress,
--     T2.TelePhoneNumberWork,
--     T2.CivilServiceStart,
--     T3.ContractCode,
--     T3.Description as ContractCodeDesc,
--     T3.ContractTypeCode,
--     T3.ContractType as ContractTypeCodeDesc,
--     T14.CostCenterCode, 
--     T14.Description as CostCenterCodeDesc,
--     T2.DateToCurrentJob,
--     T2.EmailAddress,
--     T2.EmployeeGroup,
--     T2.EmploymentStatus,
--     T2.FixTermEndDate,
--     T2.FTE,
--     T2.WorkHours,
--     T2.PartTimeEmployee,
--     T2.LoanStartDate,
--     T2.LoanEndDate,
--     T4.LocationCode,
--     T4.Description as LocationCodeDesc,
--     T8.EmployeeNumber as ManagerEmployeeNumber,
--     T8.FirstName AS ManagerFirstName,
--     T8.LastName AS ManagerLastName,
--     T7.PositionCode as ManagerPositionCode,
--     T7.Description as ManagerPositionCodeDesc,
--     T2.OrgStartDate,
--     T9.OrganisationUnit,
--     T9.OrganisationUnitDesc,
--     T10.PersonnelAreaCode,
--     T10.Description as PersonnelAreaCodeDesc,
--     T11.PersonnelSubAreaCode,
--     T11.Description as PersonnelSubAreaCodeDesc,
--     T12.PositionCode,
--     T12.Description as PositionCodeDesc,
--     T13.PSGroupCode,
--     T13.Description as PSGroupCodeDesc,
--     T2.SeniorityDate,
--     T15.ReasonForLeaving

SELECT count(*)
FROM odw_harmonised_db.hr_record_fact T1
-- LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.employee_dim T2 ON T1.EmployeeID = T2.EmployeeID and T2.IsActive = 'Y'
-- LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.contract_dim T3 ON T1.ContractID = T3.ContractID and T3.IsActive = 'Y'
-- LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.pins_location_dim T4 ON T1.LocationID = T4.LocationID and T4.IsActive = 'Y'
-- LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.employee_hr_hierarchy_dim T5 ON T1.EmployeeID = T5.EmployeeID and T5.IsActive = 'Y'
-- LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.hr_record_fact T6 ON T5.ManagerEmployeeID = T6.EmployeeID and T6.IsActive = 'Y'
-- LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.position_dim T7 ON T6.PositionID = T7.PositionID and T7.IsActive = 'Y'
-- LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.employee_dim T8 ON T6.ManagerEmployeeID = T8.EmployeeID and T8.IsActive = 'Y'
-- LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.organisationunit_dim T9 ON T1.OrganisationUnitID = T9.OrganisationUnitID and T9.IsActive = 'Y'
-- LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.personnelarea_dim T10 ON T1.PersonnelAreaID = T10.PersonnelAreaID and T10.IsActive = 'Y'
-- LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.personnelsubarea_dim T11 ON T1.PersonnelSubAreaID = T11.PersonnelSubAreaID and T11.IsActive = 'Y'
-- LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.position_dim T12 ON T1.PositionID = T12.PostionID and T12.IsActive = 'Y'
-- LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.payband_dim T13 ON T1.PaybandID = T13.PaybandID and T13.IsActive = 'Y'
-- LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.costcenter_dim T14 ON T1.CostCenterID = T14.CostCenterID and T14.IsActive = 'Y'
-- LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.employeeleavers_dim T15 ON T2.EmployeeNumber = T15.EmployeeNumber

WHERE T1.IsActive = 'Y'
